item.title: Reply to a comment by Schootingstarr on 'Trapped in an elevator for 41 hours' on /r/interestingasfuck at https://reddit.com/r/interestingasfuck/comments/40efy1/trapped_in_an_elevator_for_41_hours/cyu00p0/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to a comment by Schootingstarr on 'Trapped in an elevator for 41 hours' on /r/interestingasfuck at https://reddit.com/r/interestingasfuck/comments/40efy1/trapped_in_an_elevator_for_41_hours/cyu00p0/:

The country’s name in the local language is “Pilipinas”. The citizens are “Pilipinos”

The national language is called “Filipino” (in English) and “Pilipino” (in Filipino).

It used to be that the official Filipino alphabet did not include the letter F. This is no longer the case https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Filipino_alphabet

Also, in English, the correct adjective to use is “Philippine”, i.e. the Philippine population.
